question: I'm brand new to Obsidian. Is this too advanced?
answer: No! OSK is designed for beginners. The user guide explains everything step-by-step. Many users start with OSK on day 1 and reach intermediate level in 1-2 days.

question: I already have an Obsidian vault. Can I migrate?
answer: Yes. We provide detailed migration guides for both v2 users and custom setups. The migration guide walks you through the process step-by-step.

question: What if OSK doesn't fit my workflow?
answer: OSK is a starting point, not a straitjacket. Everything is customizable—tweak the structure, templates, and plugins to match your needs. Plus, 30-day money-back guarantee if it's not right for you.

question: How do updates work?
answer: Free lifetime updates via the store. You'll get all future updates at no additional cost. Updates are announced via email and the community.

question: Do I need to pay for Obsidian?
answer: No! Obsidian is free for personal use. OSK is a pre-built vault + comprehensive documentation + community access.

question: Is support included?
answer: Yes! Lifetime community access + priority email support + migration help. I personally respond to questions and help users get started.

question: Can I use OSK for work/commercial purposes?
answer: Yes, absolutely. Many consultants, project managers, and knowledge workers use OSK for their professional work. Just follow Obsidian's licensing (free for personal use, paid for commercial use of Obsidian itself).

question: Is this actually private?
answer: Yes. Everything runs on your computer. Voice recordings stored locally. AI model runs locally. Nothing sent to any server. Run with internet disabled - works perfectly. (Optional cloud models coming, but default is always local-first)

question: Does it work offline?
answer: Yes. After one-time AI model download (2-10 GB), everything runs on your computer. Laptop in airplane mode? Still works perfectly.

question: How fast is it?
answer: Depends on computer, model choice, and speech length. Decent laptop with small model: 1-3 seconds for few sentences. With GPU acceleration: near-instant. Larger models take few seconds longer but more accurate.

question: How accurate is it?
answer: Very. Whisper and Parakeet are among best free speech recognition models available. Accuracy depends on audio quality, background noise, and model. Larger models more accurate but slower. In practice: accurate enough for daily use without constant corrections.

question: What languages are supported?
answer: All major languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Dutch, Russian, Chinese, Japanese, Korean, and more. Select language in settings. Different models support different languages. Some have specific language variants.

question: Will this work on my computer?
answer: Windows 10/11: yes. macOS and Linux: coming soon. Don't need powerful computer, but GPU acceleration helps (NVIDIA CUDA). Works fine on CPU-only, just bit slower.

question: What microphone do I need?
answer: Whatever you already have. Built-in laptop mics work. USB mics work. Headset mics work. Better microphones = better results, but don't need anything special.

question: Can I customize the keyboard shortcut?
answer: Yes. Default is Ctrl+Space, change to whatever you want in settings.

question: What about my clipboard?
answer: App saves clipboard before pasting, restores after. Your copied content isn't lost.

question: Can I use this at work?
answer: Yes. Commercial license included. Use for personal projects, professional work, client communications, whatever you need.

question: What if I have problems?
answer: Email creator directly. Personal help. If broken, will fix. If confusing, will explain. You're not alone.

question: What's the catch with Early Access?
answer: No catch. Product works now. Called Early Access because actively building new features based on user feedback. You help shape what gets built next, and get lowest price ever.

question: Will the price increase?
answer: Yes. This is Early Access pricing. When product leaves beta, price goes up. Buy now to lock in lifetime access at this price. No future charges, ever.

question: What's your refund policy?
answer: 30-day money-back guarantee. Don't like it? Email for refund. No argument, no hassle.

question: How does this relate to your other products?
answer: Part of growing Knowii ecosystem. Voice AI helps capture thoughts faster. Knowii Community helps organize/leverage that knowledge. Knowledge Worker Kit gives frameworks to use it all effectively. Interconnected systems that amplify how you think and work.

question: How is this different from other note-taking courses?
answer: This isn't just about taking notes—it's about building a complete system for professional knowledge management. You'll learn not just what to do, but why and how to adapt it to your needs. The course starts with fundamentals but progresses to advanced techniques, making it valuable whether you're just starting or looking to enhance your existing system.

question: Is this going to be complicated?
answer: No. We start simple and build gradually. You'll never feel overwhelmed. The course focuses on timeless principles that work regardless of your tool choice.

question: Do I need special software?
answer: No. You can start with tools you already have. The course includes recommendations (including detailed Obsidian examples) but focuses on universal principles that work with any tool.

question: How much time does this take?
answer: Just 15-30 minutes a day to start. You'll build habits naturally over time. The course itself is 10+ hours, but you can progress at your own pace with lifetime access.

question: Does this work for my field?
answer: Yes. The principles work for any kind of knowledge work or learning. Students, researchers, consultants, managers, entrepreneurs, content creators—all benefit from systematic knowledge management.

question: What if I'm not tech-savvy?
answer: The course starts with basics and progresses gradually. No technical background needed. If you can use a word processor, you can build a PKM system.

question: Can I get a refund if it's not for me?
answer: Yes. Full refund if you're not completely satisfied. No questions asked.

question: Is this included in any bundles?
answer: Yes. This course is included in: Knowledge Worker Kit (€149.99), Knowii Community "Knowledge Master" tier, Everything Knowledge Bundle (€299.99)

question: Will this be updated?
answer: Yes. Evergreen content means regular updates to keep material fresh and relevant. Lifetime access includes all future updates.

question: How much time does this journaling system take daily?
answer: Daily notes take a few minutes here and there. The system is designed to not break your flow (interstitial journaling). Weekly/monthly reviews take more time but compound your growth.

question: What is MCP in simple terms?

question: Is MCP secure?
